cupcakes.name: Belgian Chocolate Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A decadent Belgian chocolate cupcake filled with chocolate ganache, topped with vanilla cream, and generously decorated with chocolate shavings.

cupcakes.name: Fresh Strawberry Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A light vanilla cupcake filled with fresh strawberries, topped with whipped cream, and finished with whole strawberries.

cupcakes.name: Red Velvet Cupcake
cupcakes.description: The classic Red Velvet with its velvety texture, filled with cream cheese and decorated with elegant sugar details.

cupcakes.name: Sicilian Lemon Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A vanilla cupcake with a refreshing touch of Sicilian lemon, topped with a delicious lemon glaze.

cupcakes.name: Vanilla Raspberry Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A vanilla cupcake filled with fresh raspberries and topped with smooth vanilla frosting.

cupcakes.name: Salted Caramel Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A sweet and salty flavor explosion with caramel batter, salted caramel filling, and a caramel topping.

cupcakes.name: Espresso Coffee Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A cupcake for coffee lovers with coffee batter, chocolate ganache, and a touch of espresso.

cupcakes.name: Caramelized Peanut Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A flavorful cupcake with peanut batter, caramel filling, and caramelized peanuts on top.

cupcakes.name: Apple Cinnamon Cupcake
cupcakes.description: The classic combination of apple and cinnamon in a moist and delicious cupcake with cinnamon topping.

cupcakes.name: Coconut Pineapple Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A tropical cupcake with grated coconut and pineapple chunks, topped with a generous layer of coconut.

cupcakes.name: Pistachio Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A sophisticated cupcake with pistachio batter, white chocolate ganache filling, and chopped pistachios.

cupcakes.name: Passion Fruit Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A cupcake with the refreshing and tropical taste of passion fruit, topped with passion fruit glaze.

cupcakes.name: Mint Chocolate Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A perfect combination of chocolate and mint in a rich cupcake, with mint cream and chocolate shavings.

cupcakes.name: Hazelnut Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A hazelnut cupcake with rich batter, chocolate ganache, and whole hazelnuts for a crunchy experience.

cupcakes.name: Mixed Berries Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A cupcake loaded with fresh mixed berries and topped with a delicious berry glaze.

cupcakes.name: Blackberry Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A cupcake packed with fresh blackberries, perfectly balanced with a blackberry glaze.

cupcakes.name: Peach Ginger Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A cupcake blending fresh peaches with a hint of ginger, topped with a smooth peach glaze.

cupcakes.name: Banana Chocolate Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A banana cupcake with chocolate chunks, perfect for fruit and chocolate lovers alike.

cupcakes.name: Lavender Cupcake
cupcakes.description: An exclusive cupcake with a gentle lavender essence, topped with lavender cream and decorated with lavender flowers.

cupcakes.name: Pumpkin Walnut Cupcake
cupcakes.description: A seasonal pumpkin cupcake with chopped walnuts and a creamy pumpkin topping.

cupcakes.name: Golden Truffle Cupcake
cupcakes.description: An exclusive limited edition cupcake with premium chocolate truffle filling, topped with vanilla bean cream, dark chocolate ganache, and elegant gold leaf decoration.
